data_table.description: Reader-Trend-Shift-Adjusted Ultrasound, Black Male, Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: LOPDWT45
variable.description: Weight for LOP [left common carotid: optimal angle]: < 1 implies imputed [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 4]

variable.name: ROPDWT45
variable.description: Weight for ROP [right common carotid: optimal angle]: < 1 implies imputed [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 4]

variable.name: LBIDWT45
variable.description: Weight for LBI [left bifurcation]: < 1 implies imputed [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 4]

variable.name: RBIDWT45
variable.description: Weight for RBI [right bifurcation]: < 1 implies imputed [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 4]

variable.name: LINDWT45
variable.description: Weight for LIN [left internal carotid]: < 1 implies imputed [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 4]

variable.name: RINDWT45
variable.description: Weight for RIN [right internal carotid]: < 1 implies imputed [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 4]

variable.name: LINDJS45
variable.description: Imputed R/T adjusted av45, shifted, LIN [left internal carotid] [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 4]

variable.name: RINDJS45
variable.description: Imputed R/T adjusted av45, shifted, RIN [right internal carotid] [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 4]

variable.name: LBIDJS45
variable.description: Imputed R/T adjusted av45, shifted, LBI [left bifurcation] [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 4]

variable.name: RBIDJS45
variable.description: Imputed R/T adjusted av45, shifted, RBI [right bifurcation] [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 4]

variable.name: LOPDJS45
variable.description: Imputed R/T adjusted av45, shifted, LOP [left common carotid: optimal angle] [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 4]

variable.name: ROPDJS45
variable.description: Imputed R/T adjusted av45, shifted, ROP [right common carotid: optimal angle] [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 4]

variable.name: SUMWTD45
variable.description: Weight for MND45_1S(=no. of obs sites/6) [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 4]

variable.name: MND45_1S
variable.description: Mean of the JS45 variables [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 4]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Reader-trend-shift-adjusted ultrasound, black male, exam 4]
